## ClassFieldStatementsMap.groupStatementsMap() method

Get the current set of statements for each statement group, sorted by field name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
groupStatementsMap(statementGroup: string): ReadonlyMap<string, ClassFieldStatement[]> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statementGroup | string | The statement group owning the statements. |

**Returns:**

ReadonlyMap&lt;string, [ClassFieldStatement](./ts-morph-structures.classfieldstatement.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt; \| undefined
